page.title: 04Martinstown weekends.
page.content: Martinstown on Saturday isn't boring ! I get up for breakfast-crushed cornflakes! and I sit around watching television. Mum often takes us into Dorchester shopping, just like my nan used to when she wasn't much older than me. Of course we go by car unlike my nan who had to cycle everywhere, even to work. We come home for dinner. I like beans, or egg on toast, because it doesn't take long to eat. After dinner I do my homework until my little sister Polly nags enough for me to go to the playground. It's good fun there's a slide, swings and bars, we go there every Saturday and race to be first on the swing. We go home exhausted but Polly will soon want to go out again. We carry on like this until tea. I like Martinstown on Saturdays!
